result.title: No Idea for this problem.
result.content:
There are N radars in a forest (a 2D place!) in which some of them are blue and some are red.

We want to set the radius of each radars so that blue and red radars have no conflict with each other.

Set the radius of each radar in order to maximizing the area they cover. A radar's radius should be at most R.

Any help will be appreciated.
